title: Instrument Specification Definition
description: The Instrument Specification Definition for Astro CSM

DETECTOR_CENTER.description: Center of the detector in pixel coordinates

CENTER_EPHEMERIS_TIME.description: The center ephemeris time of the image

STARTING_EPHEMERIS_TIME.description: The starting ephemeris time of the image

FOCAL_LENGTH_MODEL.description: A key to get information about time/temp dependent focal length models

FOCAL_LENGTH.description: The focal length of the camera in mm

FOCAL_LENGTH_EPSILON.description: The uncertainty of the focal length of the camera in mm

IFOV.description: Instantaneous field of view in degrees

IMAGE_LINES.description: The number of lines in the image

IMAGE_SAMPLES.description: The the number of samples in the image

RADII.description: The radius object FIXME this needs to be expanded to support up to 3 elts. either std carto a,b,c or equi, polar, etc

SEMI_MINOR_AXIS.description: The target ellipsoid's minor axis in meters

OPTICAL_DISTORTION.description: Information needed to convert from undistorted to distorted image plane

key.description: key into LUT to determine equation to use

STARTING_DETECTOR_SAMPLE.description: The sample on the detector where the data starts

STARTING_DETECTOR_LINE.description: The line on the detector where the data starts

FOCAL2PIXEL_X.description: Transformation x coefficients from focal plane (mm) to pixel coordinates

FOCAL2PIXEL_Y.description: Transformation y coefficients from focal plane (mm) to pixel coordinates

SENSOR_LOCATION.description: (X, Y, Z) location of sensor in body-fixed frame.

SENSOR_VELOCITY.description: (v_x, v_y, v_z) velocity of sensor in body-fixed frame.

SUN_POSITION.description: (v_x, v_y, v_z) velocity of sun in body-fixed frame.

SUN_VELOCITY.description: (v_x, v_y, v_z) velocity of sun in body-fixed frame.

ORIENTATION.description: Orientation of the sensor provided in quaternions

DETECTOR_LINE_RATE.description: The line rates of the detector map with the associated start line and time

APPLY_LIGHT_TIME_CORRECTION.description: A flag to indcate whether the light-time correction should be applied

DT_EPHEM.description: The time between each ephemeris point.

T0_EPHEM.description: First ephemeris time - center ephemeris time

T0_QUAT.description: First quaternion time - center quaternion time.

REFERENCE_HEIGHT.description: Used for determining the intersection of the look vector with the ellipsoid

INTERPOLATION_METHOD.description: The type of interpolation method to use.
